name: 'The Wedding' Quiz / Test | 'West Wing' - Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Was Ellie glad to see Will at the wedding?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Will told Kate he thought he wasn't invited to the wedding because of everything that happened in "The Undecideds". Kate invited him to the wedding as her guest. When Ellie saw Will at the wedding, she asked her mother what Will was doing there.

questions.text: How many ambassadors did Carol say Ellie was to meet and accept their gifts?
questions.explanation:
71.

	Among the ambassadors Ellie was meeting was the French Ambassador, the Bermuda Ambassador and the Romanian Ambassador. Because of time constraint, Abbey told Carol maybe they should just forget all of Eastern Europe.

questions.text: In the story President Bartlet told Ellie, what country did he say they were in when Ellie ran away from them?
questions.explanation:
Germany.

	They were just about to walk down the aisle when President Bartlet stopped and told Ellie the story of them being in Berlin, Germany when Ellie ran away from them. Ellie said she remembered waving at the guards and then watching them wave at each other.

questions.text: Josh told Donna to make sure that Santos had what kind of food instead of a Philly cheese steak?
questions.explanation:
Hoagie.

	Donna called Josh about the sandwich and told him that people thought that Santos would look like a pansy if he was eating a hoagie while Baker had a Philly cheese steak so Josh told her to let him have a cheese steak but with Cheese Whiz and no onions. Later while Donna was talking to Josh over the phone, viewers saw Santos changing shirts because he had Cheese Whiz all over the shirt he was wearing.

questions.text: If the President was unable to walk Ellie down the aisle, who did Abbey say was the substitute?
questions.explanation:
Uncle Norman.

	With the negotiations going on between China and Kazakhstan, Abbey had a substitute ready to walk Ellie down the aisle in case he was unable to be there.

questions.text: Who did Goodwin say was the best person to take over for Josh in the Santos-McGarry campaign?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	Barry Goodwin told Santos that he was looking at the best man to take over for Josh and Leo's face dropped when he realized that Santos was seriously considering him to take over Josh's job.

questions.text: How long was the wedding postponed while the President was on the phone with the Chinese Ambassador?
questions.explanation:
46 minutes.

	Debbie kept giving the President post-it notes with the time written on them. The President was talking on the phone to President Lian trying to keep China from invading Kazakhstan.

questions.text: When did Vic tell the President he wanted to marry Ellie?
options: When they discovered they were pregnant
questions.explanation:
Third date.

	The President wanted to know if Vic decided to marry Ellie when they found out they were pregnant. Vic said he decided to marry Ellie 11 months, 12 weeks, and 3 days ago while they were on their third date. The President then wanted to know what was wrong with the first two dates.

questions.text: When CJ was playing dignitary bingo, what person did she have left to find before she won the game?
questions.explanation:
Mexican Ambassador.

	CJ gave Josh the bingo card for him to play so he would relax a little bit. She told him to find the Mexican Ambassador and he would have won the game.

No.

	Leo told Goodwin and Montgomery that Josh was the best person for the job and he offered to help Josh with the last six weeks of the Santos campaign.
